name: Yoke Network
slogan: One of the world's largest performance based influencer marketing network's
description:
When performance marketing meets content creators! 
We help brands to grow through influencers on a performance basis.

At Yoke we collaborate with the world's top Tiktok, Instagram and Snapchat influencers to create amazing content and deliver tangible results for our clients!

Through our influencer app (Yoke Analytics) influencers have an easy way to monetise their audience and manage their performance.

jobs.title: Senior Partnership Manager
jobs.description:
Company Overview

We help mobile apps & brands to grow on a performance basis through social media influencers. Through our powerful network of Tiktok, Instagram & Snapchat influencers we have worked with the largest mobile apps in the industry to deliver data driven results. 

We’re growing at an incredible rate and you will have a huge impact as you will be playing a pivotal role in helping us to scale.
Our aim is to become a truly global company with core technology that can be utilised by the wider social media ecosystem.
 
This is a role for you, if you:

• Want to have a huge impact and build your career

• Are a people person

• Are goal driven

• Are well organised

• Have sales experience (either booking meetings, marketing or selling directly to the end client)

If so, Yoke is the perfect place for you!
 
Location: London
 
Job Summary:

• Creating new business opportunities and building your own long term client list

• Organising business meetings with prospective clients

• Attending industry events

• Working closely with the CEO to execute brand strategy

• Tracking and managing prospects (in CRM)
 
The role:

• £24,000 (basic salary) + commission.

• You will be working directly with the co-founders

• You must be an independent worker
 
Benefits:

• Equity option in the company

• Cake on your birthday!

• Team outings

• A senior role in the company 

• Office in the centre of London with an amazing view

• Joining the Yoke family :)
 
Sounds interesting?

Send through you CV to jobs@yokenetwork.com
We are looking forward to meeting you! :)
